timeline.bodyText: Could this be improved to an actual response? Or do we want to continue processing?
timeline.author: bamandel

replies.bodyText: Azure will be calling this controller since this is the callback URL.  So to send a response here would send it to the Azure server which would not update the Alert UI for the user.  We redirect back to the Alert UI at the end.  We could put query parameters with some details however we don't have a mechanism now to parse the query parameters in the URL to update the UI state at all.
replies.author: psantos1113
